data.comment: The match is underway at PreZero Arena.
Throw-in for B. Munich close to the penalty box.
In the minute 2, Free kick B. Munich.
Corentin Tolisso is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Jerome Boateng for the away team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 4, B. Munichâ€™s Corentin Tolisso is on his feet again at PreZero Arena.
In Sinsheim a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Can B. Munich get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hoffenheim's half?
In the minute 6, Can B. Munich capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Hoffenheim's half?
Benjamin Brand signals a free kick to Hoffenheim in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Hoffenheim in Sinsheim.
In the minute 9, B. Munich have been awarded a corner by Benjamin Brand.
Throw-in for Hoffenheim at PreZero Arena.
Dennis Geiger (Hoffenheim) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 11, Throw-in B. Munich.
Hoffenheim's Andrej Kramaric is whistled for offside at PreZero Arena.
Joshua Zirkzee (B. Munich) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 13, Corner awarded to B. Munich.
B. Munich to take a throw-in in Hoffenheim territory.
Free kick for B. Munich in the half of Hoffenheim.
In the minute 15, Free kick for Hoffenheim in their own half.
Hoffenheim have been awarded a corner by Benjamin Brand.
Goal! Ermin Bicakcic heads Hoffenheim into a 1-0 lead.
In the minute 16, Great play from Dennis Geiger to set up the goal.
Goal kick for Hoffenheim at PreZero Arena.
B. Munich awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 20, Benjamin Brand signals a free kick to B. Munich.
Hoffenheim's Dennis Geiger has been booked in Sinsheim.
Benjamin Brand signals a throw-in for B. Munich, close to Hoffenheim's area.
In the minute 22, Corner awarded to B. Munich.
In Sinsheim, Benjamin Pavard (B. Munich) misses the target with a header.
Benjamin Brand awards Hoffenheim a goal kick.
In the minute 23, Ball goes out of play for a Hoffenheim goal kick.
Goal! Hoffenheim extend their lead to 2-0 through Munas Dabbur.
In Sinsheim, Serge Gnabry of B. Munich is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 27, B. Munich's Joshua Zirkzee attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sinsheim.
Benjamin Brand awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 28, Free kick for B. Munich in the half of Hoffenheim.
Christoph Baumgartner (Hoffenheim) gets a yellow card.
In Sinsheim B. Munich's Thomas Muller is caught offside.
In the minute 29, Hoffenheim's Christoph Baumgartner breaks free at PreZero Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
B. Munich have a goal kick.
Benjamin Brand signals a B. Munich throw-in in Hoffenheim's half.
In the minute 31, Goal kick for Hoffenheim at PreZero Arena.
B. Munich awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Hoffenheim.
In the minute 33, Andrej Kramaric (Hoffenheim) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Hoffenheim.
Free kick for B. Munich in their own half.
In the minute 34, B. Munich's Thomas Muller gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Hoffenheim goal kick.
B. Munich attack but Leroy Sane's header doesn't find the target.
In the minute 35, Benjamin Brand awards Hoffenheim a goal kick.
Throw-in for Hoffenheim in their own half.
Goal! The away team reduce the deficit to 2-1 through a strike by Joshua Kimmich. .
In the minute 36, Thomas Muller with an assist there.
Benjamin Brand waits before resuming play because Ermin Bicakcic for Hoffenheim is still down.
In the minute 39, Benjamin Brand signals a free kick to Hoffenheim.
Sebastian Hoeness (Hoffenheim) has taken off Ermin Bicakcic who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Robert Skov is the replacement.
Hoffenheim have been awarded a corner by Benjamin Brand.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sinsheim.
In the minute 42, Benjamin Brand signals a free kick to B. Munich in their own half.
Hoffenheim needs to be cautious. B. Munich have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 45, Andrej Kramaric of Hoffenheim smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In Sinsheim a free kick has been awarded the home team.
B. Munich have a goal kick.
In the minute 45, Ball safe as B. Munich is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The first-half is over.
Andrej Kramaric (Hoffenheim) has received a first yellow card.
The second-half has started.
In the minute 46, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ball goes out of play for a Hoffenheim goal kick.
Benjamin Brand awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 48, Benjamin Brand signals a free kick to B. Munich.
Throw-in for Hoffenheim at PreZero Arena.
Joshua Zirkzee for B. Munich is whistled offside.
In the minute 49, B. Munich awarded a free kick in their own half.
Benjamin Brand signals a free kick to Hoffenheim in their own half.
Munas Dabbur for Hoffenheim drives towards goal at PreZero Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 51, Hoffenheim are pushing forward but Munas Dabbur's finish is wide of the goal.
B. Munich have a goal kick.
Throw-in for B. Munich in the half of Hoffenheim.
In the minute 52, B. Munich drives forward and Leroy Sane gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Free kick for B. Munich in the half of Hoffenheim.
Throw-in Hoffenheim.
In the minute 54, Throw-in for Hoffenheim in their own half.
Hoffenheim awarded a free kick in their own half.
B. Munich awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 55, Free kick for B. Munich in their own half.
Throw-in for B. Munich in the half of Hoffenheim.
In Sinsheim a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 57, B. Munich apply pressure at PreZero Arena and a brilliant scoring opportunity is created for Joshua Zirkzee but the strike hits the bar!
Benjamin Brand signals a free kick to Hoffenheim in their own half.
Leon Goretzka is replacing Benjamin Pavard for the away team.
In the minute 57, Robert Lewandowski is on a sub for Joshua Zirkzee for B. Munich.
Can Hoffenheim capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
The home team replace Dennis Geiger with Ihlas Bebou.
In the minute 58, Hoffenheim make their third substitution with Mijat Gacinovic replacing Christoph Baumgartner.
Can Hoffenheim get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in B. Munich's half?
Free kick B. Munich.
In the minute 61, Ball safe as Hoffenheim is awarded a throw-in in their half.
B. Munich's Robert Lewandowski has run offside.
B. Munich's Leroy Sane misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 62, Benjamin Brand awards Hoffenheim a goal kick.
Benjamin Brand signals a free kick to Hoffenheim.
Hoffenheim have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 64, B. Munich awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Hoffenheim have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in high up the field for Hoffenheim in Sinsheim.
In the minute 65, B. Munich needs to be cautious. Hoffenheim have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for B. Munich in their own half.
Goal kick for Hoffenheim at PreZero Arena.
In the minute 67, It's a goal kick for the home team in Sinsheim.
Throw-in Hoffenheim.
B. Munich have been awarded a corner by Benjamin Brand.
In the minute 72, Goal kick for Hoffenheim at PreZero Arena.
Jamal Musiala is replacing Corentin Tolisso for B. Munich at PreZero Arena.
Hans-Dieter Flick (B. Munich) is making a fourth substitution, with Kingsley Coman replacing Leroy Sane.
In the minute 73, Benjamin Brand blows against B. Munich's Robert Lewandowski for offside.
Benjamin Brand signals a throw-in for Hoffenheim, close to B. Munich's area.
In Sinsheim Hoffenheim drive forward through Robert Skov. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 74, Ball safe as B. Munich is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ball goes out of play for a Hoffenheim goal kick.
Free kick Hoffenheim.
In the minute 76, Free kick for Hoffenheim in the half of B. Munich.
Benjamin Brand awards Hoffenheim a goal kick.
Goal! Hoffenheim extend their lead to 3-1 through Andrej Kramaric.
In the minute 77, That's a fine assist from Ihlas Bebou.
Benjamin Brand signals a Hoffenheim throw-in in B. Munich's half.
The home team have replaced Munas Dabbur with Florian Grillitsch. This is the fourth substitution made today by Sebastian Hoeness.
In the minute 81, Corner awarded to B. Munich.
Kingsley Coman of B. Munich gets in a strike, but is off target.
Hoffenheim have a goal kick.
In the minute 82, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sinsheim.
Andrej Kramaric (Hoffenheim) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 84, Throw-in for Hoffenheim close to the penalty box.
In Sinsheim a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Hoffenheim have a goal kick.
In the minute 87, Can B. Munich capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Hoffenheim's half?
Hoffenheim are coming forward and Andrej Kramaric gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Benjamin Brand awards B. Munich a goal kick.
In the minute 89, Ball goes out of play for a B. Munich goal kick.
Important block from the Hoffenheim defence as Leon Goretzka fires in a strike for B. Munich.
An attacking Hoffenheim player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
Throw-in for Hoffenheim at PreZero Arena.
Thomas Muller for B. Munich gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sinsheim.
Hoffenheim's Andrej Kramaric misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for B. Munich at PreZero Arena.
Full-time! The final score is 4-1.
Manuel Neuer is booked for the away team.
Jerome Boateng (B. Munich) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Hoffenheim have extended their lead to 4-1 courtesy of a Andrej Kramaric penalty.
